en: And he said unto me, Son of man, eat that which thou findest; eat this roll, and go, speak unto the house of Israel.
hmr: Chun, ka kuoma chun, “Mihriem naupa, i hmu kha fa la, hi lekhabu zuol hi fa la, chun, fe la, Israel sûngkuohai lai chun thu va hril rawh,” a mi ta.

en: So I opened my mouth, and he caused me to eat the roll.
hmr: Chuongchun, ka bau chu ka kah a, lekhabu zuol chu a mîn fâktir tah a.

en: And he said unto me, Son of man, cause thy belly to eat, and fill thy bowels with this roll that I give thee. Then did I eat it; and it was in my mouth as honey for sweetness.
hmr: Chun, ka kuoma chun, “Mihriem naupa, i phîng kha infâktir la, hi lekhabu zuol ka pêk che hin i phîng kha sukkhawp rawh,” a ta. Chuong- chun, ka fâk tah a; ka baua chun ân hnik dân chu khuoizu ang el a nih.

en: And he said unto me, Son of man, go, get thee unto the house of Israel, and speak with my words unto them.
hmr: Chun, ama chun ka kuomah a hril a, “Mihriem naupa, fe la, Israel sûngkuohai kuomah va fe ta, an kuoma chun ka thu hi va hril rawh.

en: For thou art not sent to a people of a strange speech and of a hard language, but to the house of Israel;
hmr: Mi ṭawng danglam le ṭawng intakhai kuoma tir i ni nawh a, Israel sûngkuohai kuoma tir i ni lem;

en: not to many peoples of a strange speech and of a hard language, whose words thou canst not understand. Surely, if I sent thee to them, they would hearken unto thee.
hmr: hnam tamtak ṭawng danglam le ṭawng harsatakhai, an ṭawnghai i hriet thei nawhai kuoma tir i ni nawh. Matheiloin, an kuomah ka tir che chun, i thu chu ngai ding chu an nih a.

en: But the house of Israel will not hearken unto thee; for they will not hearken unto me: for all the house of Israel are of a hard forehead and of a stiff heart.
hmr: Amiruokchu, Israel sûngkuohai chun i thu ngai naw ni hai a, keia thu an ngai naw ding leiin; Israel sûngkuohai po po chu chal changtak, lungril ngartak ruok an ni leiin.

en: Behold, I have made thy face hard against their faces, and thy forehead hard against their foreheads.
hmr: Ngai ta, i hmêl chu an hmaisana chun ka sukngar tah a, an chalhai hmaihmaa chun i chal chu ka sukchang ta bawk a nih.

en: As an adamant harder than flint have I made thy forehead: fear them not, neither be dismayed at their looks, though they are a rebellious house.
hmr: Lungrâl chu meitâwklung nêka a chang lem angin, i chal ka siem tah a; anni chu ṭi dêr naw rawh, anni hei hmua chun beidawng bawk naw la, sûngkaw hel hmangtak ni hai sien- khawm” tiin.

en: Moreover he said unto me, Son of man, all my words that I shall speak unto thee receive in thy heart, and hear with thine ears.
hmr: Chu nawa khawm ka kuoma chun, “Mihriem naupa, i kuoma thu ka hril ding po pohai chu i nahai chun ngai la, i lungrila chun pawm rawh.

en: And go, get thee to them of the captivity, unto the children of thy people, and speak unto them, and tell them, Thus saith the Lord Jehovah; whether they will hear, or whether they will forbear.
hmr: Chun, fe la, an sal intângnaa chun, i mihai thlahai kuoma chun fe la, an kuomah thu hril la, anni chu hril rawh; an ngai khawmin, an ngaisak naw khawma, ‘Lalpa Pathien chun hieng hin a tih,’ ti rawh,” tiin.

en: Then the Spirit lifted me up, and I heard behind me the voice of a great rushing, saying, Blessed be the glory of Jehovah from his place.
hmr: Chun, thlarau chun a mi dawm kâng a, ka hnungtieng chun râwl ri nasatak ang ka hriet a, “Ama hmuna inthawka suok LALPA ropuina chu inpâkin um raw se,” tiin.

en: And I heard the noise of the wings of the living creatures as they touched one another, and the noise of the wheels beside them, even the noise of a great rushing.
hmr: Thilhringhai thlahai intawk ri le, an sîra tawlailîr kekuolhai tlân khâwm ri nasatak chu a nih ka hriet chu.

en: So the Spirit lifted me up, and took me away; and I went in bitterness, in the heat of my spirit; and the hand of Jehovah was strong upon me.
hmr: Chuongchun, thlarau chun a mi dawm kâng a, a mi lâk hmang tah a; lungawilotak le lunginsen êm êmin ka fe tah a; chun, LALPA kut chu ka chunga chun a hrât hle a.

en: Then I came to them of the captivity at Tel-abib, that dwelt by the river Chebar, and to where they dwelt; and I sat there overwhelmed among them seven days.
hmr: Chun, sal intânghai, Kebar vadung panga Tel-abiba umhai, an umna hmun ngeia chun ka va feh a; chun, an kuomah chutaka chun maktiin ni sari sûng ka ṭhung tah a.

en: And it came to pass at the end of seven days, that the word of Jehovah came unto me, saying,
hmr: Chun, ni sarihai tâwpa chun, LALPA thu chu ka kuomah a hung a,

en: Son of man, I have made thee a watchman unto the house of Israel: therefore hear the word at my mouth, and give them warning from me.
hmr: “Mihriem naupa, Israel sûng- kuo vêngtu dingin ka siem che a nih: chuleiin, ka baua thu chu ngai la, keimaa inthawkin vaulâwkna chu pe rawh.

en: When I say unto the wicked, Thou shalt surely die; and thou givest him not warning, nor speakest to warn the wicked from his wicked way, to save his life; the same wicked man shall die in his iniquity; but his blood will I require at thy hand.
hmr: Mi rilo kuomah thu ka hril a, ‘Nang chu matheiloin i thi ngei ding a nih,’ ka tih a, ama chu vaulâwkna khawm i lo pêk nawh a, a hringna chu sanhimna dinga mi rilo chu a lampui riloa inthawk hung kîr dinga vau- lâwkna i lo hril si naw chun; chu mi rilo chu ama suol ngeia chun thîng a tih, amiruokchu, a thisen maw chu nangmaa chun ka hung phût ding a nih.

en: Yet if thou warn the wicked, and he turn not from his wickedness, nor from his wicked way, he shall die in his iniquity; but thou hast delivered thy soul.
hmr: Amiruokchu, mi rilo chu i vaulâwk a, a rîtlonaa inthawkin amanih, a lampui riloa inthawkin amanih a kîr naw chun a suola chun thîng a tih; nisienlakhawm, nang chun i thla chu sansuok i tih.

en: Again, when a righteous man doth turn from his righteousness, and commit iniquity, and I lay a stumblingblock before him, he shall die: because thou hast not given him warning, he shall die in his sin, and his righteous deeds which he hath done shall not be remembered; but his blood will I require at thy hand.
hmr: Chu bâkah mi fel chu a felnaa inthawka ân herhmang a, suol a thaw pha chun, ama hmaa chun tlûkna lung ka sieh a, ama chu thi ngei a tih; ama chu vaulâwkna chu i lo pêk naw leiin, a suolnaa chun thîng a ta; chun, a thil fel thawhai chu hriet zing ni ta naw ni; amiruokchu, a thisen maw chu nangma kutah hung phût ka tih.

en: Nevertheless if thou warn the righteous man, that the righteous sin not, and he doth not sin, he shall surely live, because he took warning; and thou hast delivered thy soul.
hmr: Amiruokchu, mi fel chu vau- lâwkna i nei a, mi fel chu a lo suol nawh a, suol a thaw naw chun, ama chu hring ngei a tih; vaulâwkna chu a pawisak lei chun, nang khawma i thla chu sanhim i tih.

en: And the hand of Jehovah was there upon me; and he said unto me, Arise, go forth into the plain, and I will there talk with thee.
hmr: Chun, LALPA kut chu chutaka chun ka chungah a um a, ka kuoma chun, “Tho la, phai tieng fe suok la, chutaka chun inbiekpui ka ti che,” a ta.

en: Then I arose, and went forth into the plain: and, behold, the glory of Jehovah stood there, as the glory which I saw by the river Chebar; and I fell on my face.
hmr: Chun, ka tho a, phaia chun ka fe tah a, chun, ngai ta, Kebar vadung sîra ropuina ka hmu ang el khan, chutaka chun LALPA ropuina chu a ngîr a; chuongchun, bawkkhupin ka tlu tah a.

en: Then the Spirit entered into me, and set me upon my feet; and he spake with me, and said unto me, Go, shut thyself within thy house.
hmr: Chun, thlarau chu keimaa chun a hung lût a, ka kehai chun a mîn ngîrtir tah a; chun, a mîn biekpui a, ka kuomah, “Fe la, i inah inkhâr khum rawh.

en: But thou, son of man, behold, they shall lay bands upon thee, and shall bind thee with them, and thou shalt not go out among them:
hmr: Chun, nang mihriem naupa, ngai ta, i chunga chun khuopnahai sieng an ta, chuonghai chun khuop an ti cheh a, anni lai chu fe suok naw ti ni:

en: and I will make thy tongue cleave to the roof of thy mouth, that thou shalt be dumb, and shalt not be to them a reprover; for they are a rebellious house.
hmr: chun, i lei chu i dang chungah inkawptir tlat ka ta, ṭawng thei loin um i ta, an kuoma chun kâwktu ni nâwng i tih, anni chu sûngkaw hel hmang an ni sih a.

en: But when I speak with thee, I will open thy mouth, and thou shalt say unto them, Thus saith the Lord Jehovah: He that heareth, let him hear; and he that forbeareth, let him forbear: for they are a rebellious house.
hmr: Nisienlakhawm, nanga kuoma thu ka hung hril pha chun, i bau chu hawng ka ta, an kuoma chun, ‘Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a tih,’ tîng i tih. A hre taphawt chun lo ngai raw se; a ngaisak naw taphawt chu ngaisak loin um raw se; sûngkaw hel hmang an ni sih a.
